amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for the Medical Community Care account to express the need for the Department of Veterans Affairs to address emergency care coverage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rodgers (WA) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rodgers (WA) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
